channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023090622
item.description:
Report X-2023090622

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-11
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023090622 Pkg arrived wet and was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in Hazmat bin. 2. X-2023090623 SequenceEvent: Pkg arrived wet and was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPS for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles, DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in Hazmat bin. 3.
